Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory152.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just a few floors away from reaching the top. Gotta say the inside of this tower looks just like that of the Nighter...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'You got it backward, Babylonian.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking down the stairs is the familiar feminine figure of Qu, yet vastly different from her imposter on the ship. Her footsteps ring in majesty as she approaches.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'And—this place has a name. The Observatory. Not just any "tower."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'This place is called the Observatory?', 3: '12', 4: 'Why is it called that?', 5: '15'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Indeed. Its height is to observe the stars.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "If you want to see the stars, why not do it in space? You'll get a clearer view.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'There is no better description of the folly of human conceits, than what you describe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'From here, you can see the stars filling the universe. Learn that Earth is a very small stage in a vast cosmic arena.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "We're not here to chit-chat. You know the situation, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Things are not looking good. Some Ascendants found their way in here. We have to protect Huaxu and keep it from falling into their hands.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'You still have Huaxu with you, right?', 3: '105', 4: 'Has Gabriel come?', 5: '107'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "Of course I do. And it's none of your concern.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: 'Not yet. Nor do I know where he is.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "So we're good for now, at least. Phew...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Liv, you've been like this since we got here. Are you not feeling well?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla is relieved to hear Qu's reply. Meanwhile, Liv's face turns grim as she fiddles with the device in her hand, as if beset by self-doubt."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What's wrong, Liv?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'That Qu, the leader of Kowloong, is an Ascendant...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "This city's being ruled by an Ascendant? How's that even possible?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It might be hard to believe, but it's true. I've ran several scans to reconfirm.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Yes. I've ran several scans to test. She displays similar viral reactions to Alpha and Roland.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "What the hell...? If she's an Ascendant, why would she start this war? To lure us here?", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "The Ascendants wouldn't bother doing something like that, and neither would I.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "You make it sound like... you aren't one of them.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "There's no rule that says all Ascendants have to band together, or that an Ascendant can't govern a human city.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I'm an outlier, that's all. In order to contain the virus spreading from me, I cloistered myself in the Observatory, running every aspect of this city in these confines.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla tenses up as Qu approaches. Qu wears a smirk on her face, but her hands are still tightly held to her weapon. A dreadful silence reigns the tower.'}
{2: 'What is it that Kowloong wants?', 3: '38', 4: "What's your endgame here?", 5: '39'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Kowloong Corp has but one goal—To preserve all that is of value on Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I am but the vessel of our common wish—To preserve all that is of value on Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Preserve Earth...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Babylonia has been doing something similar, I know. With historical artifacts, pre-pandemic data, and whatnot, yes?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Are you talking about WGAA?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'But that is nothing compared to our grand design.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "How could you? Me, the president, everyone! We're all working in earnest to study and rejuvenate human cultures, to prepare for the day we reclaim Earth...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'That day will never come.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'All your talk about reclaiming Earth, reconnecting the world is nothing but a joke. History ended the moment the virus broke out.', 4: '1'}
{2: "We haven't ended.", 3: '49', 4: 'The virus will be another episode in our history.', 5: '50'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "We're all on borrowed time. How much longer do you think you can last?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Another episode in human history... So you honestly think there's still a future for Earth?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Foolish though your ideals may be, your words speak to something special. Tell me your name, commandant of Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: '(Tell her your name)'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '【kuroname】, your name will be inscribed in a special place. Consider it a parting gift.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Life will fade, machines will break down, the world will perish. This is why things that have value must be preserved. Kowloong will be the final epithet of Earth.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'When all lights go out, when all goes dark, this place will still burn. Like fire, we will stay a beacon for visitors in the eons to come.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'They will know that we, "humanity," lived. Like fossils, we will leave behind a legacy. This is Kowloong. This, is Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Resistance is futile. Accept death with grace. That's the way we, the once ruler of Earth, should bow out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'And through this war, I finally realized that to complete the Tabula Akasha, the world must first be ended.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You are going to...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'I came here expecting a certain Ascendant first, but no matter.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Earth's demise is set in stone. The question of who goes first and who goes later is inconsequential.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Fall, and become history, Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Guys, guards are coming from downstairs...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "I knew it! She's ambushing us here!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Commandant, we'll hold our position here. You go up.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Are you asking me to abandon you?', 3: '70', 4: 'I can fight too.', 5: '70'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'This is the best strategy... Go a few more floors up so that the reinforcements can pick up your signal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Yup, President Hassen will send reinforcements for sure!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Run, Commandant! Don't look back!", 4: '2'}
